text: The Affairs of Martha, also known as Once Upon a Thursday, is a 1942 American romantic comedy movie directed by Jules Dassin and starring Marsha Hunt, Frances Duke, Richard Carlson, Marjorie Main, Virginia Weidler, Allyn Joslyn, Melville Cooper. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1942 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Jules Dassin
title: The Affairs of Martha
